data.title: Group Experiences
data.text:
SUMMIT I / SUMMIT II

Treat your group to food, fun and Thunder Basketball by booking your Summit I or II box today. With room to mingle, you and up to 34 of your closest friends can enjoy bottomless popcorn, hot dogs, cookies and your choice of water or Coca-Cola products.

Upgraded catering available

SONIC PATIO

Catch every shot, every swish and every iconic Thunder Basketball moment in the Sonic Patio. This exclusive party space includes flat-screen TVs, custom catering packages and a cashless bar option.

Minimum group size of 36; holds up to 50

THE RESERVE

Luxury with a downtown view, the Reserve at Local GastroPub is a refined pregame social space accompanied with all the fixings. Book the Reserve as your next group meeting space to score big points with your boss or clients.

Minimum group size of 15; holds up to 56

THE HUDDLE

Want a classy, laid-back dinner spot with baseline seats? The Huddle at Michelob ULTRA Club is your best fit with a hearty buffet and beverages. Thereâs a spectacular view of the evolving downtown area at no additional cost.

Maximum group size of 36

POST OAK PARTY TERRACE

Get your group the high energy experience of the Post Oak Party Terrace. Seats are close to the Club Level entertainment stage and each ticket includes $30 food and beverage credit that can be used at any bar or concession stand on the Club Level.
